chunks.zh: 为什么要去探亲,探亲的意义是什么
chunks.en: Why visit relatives, what is the meaning of visiting relatives?

chunks.zh: 我个人理解的探亲是父辈的关系纽带.
chunks.en: My personal understanding of visiting relatives is that it's a bond between the older generation.

chunks.zh: 探亲就是为了让我维持我与父辈以及父辈与我同年龄段的关系.
chunks.en: Visiting relatives is to maintain my relationship with my parents' generation and their peers.

chunks.zh:
但这过程中我发现

这与我想的背道而驰.
chunks.en: But in this process, I found that it goes against what I thought.

chunks.zh:
攀比成了他们探亲的动力

从小就被抓着去探亲.
chunks.en: Comparing became their motivation for visiting relatives. I was dragged to visit relatives since I was little.

chunks.zh: 路上往返 6 个小时.
chunks.en: It's a 6-hour round trip.

chunks.zh:
每次都是匆匆得吃个中午饭就走人了

去了十几年,连人都没记全,因为我知道记不住,索性就不去记了.
chunks.en: Every time, we hurriedly eat lunch and leave. I've been going for over ten years, and I haven't even remembered everyone's names, because I knew I couldn't remember them, so I simply didn't bother trying.

chunks.zh: 今年父母又叫我去探亲,我都不认识,不想去.
chunks.en: This year, my parents asked me to visit relatives again, but I don't even know them, and I don't want to go.

chunks.zh: @bclerdx 不杠纯探讨。人情世故的意义是价值之间的人利用与被利用。
chunks.en: @bclerdx No argument, just a discussion. The meaning of social interaction is the utilization and being utilized between people of value.

chunks.zh: 对父辈所经历的那种需要协作才能完成的农耕社会，唯有维系好邻里关系，村里人关系，你家麦子抢收时才有人帮忙收。
chunks.en: For the older generation's agricultural society, where cooperation was needed, only by maintaining good neighborly relations and village relationships could you get help harvesting your wheat.

chunks.zh: 但是现在的人情世故就不见得了。
chunks.en: But now, social interaction is not necessarily the case.

chunks.zh: 价值买卖透明，大家更愿意拉下脸来直接报价，
chunks.en: The value of transactions is transparent; everyone is more willing to directly quote prices.

chunks.zh: 现在的人是村里雇台收割机师傅，直接看地大小报价。
chunks.en: Now, people hire a harvester from the village and directly quote prices based on the size of the land.

chunks.zh: 找亲戚帮忙的时候少很多了。
chunks.en: There are far fewer times when people ask relatives for help.

chunks.zh: 如果 op 是个上班族，对他有用的人情世故倒不如微信上多给 IT 圈里的猎头们发发红包，拜拜年。
chunks.en: If the OP is an office worker, the social interaction that would be useful to him would be to send more red envelopes to headhunters in the IT circle on WeChat and wish them a Happy New Year.

chunks.zh: 领导天天让你加班工作也没这么大意见。
chunks.en: You don't have as much objection to your boss asking you to work overtime every day.

chunks.zh: 配合家人去走半天亲戚比这还委屈？
chunks.en: Is it more of a grievance to spend half a day visiting relatives with your family than that?

chunks.zh: 手机打字手滑了
chunks.en: My finger slipped while typing on my phone.

chunks.zh: 探你父母的亲本来就对你没有直接意义，意义是对你父母的，你父母想要见见自己的亲人。
chunks.en: Visiting your parents' relatives doesn't have direct meaning for you; the meaning is for your parents, who want to see their own relatives.

chunks.zh: 对你的意义是如果你父母不带上你，他们会不开心，你去是为了让你父母开心，不是为了给你自己找意义
chunks.en: The meaning for you is that if your parents don't take you, they will be unhappy. You're going to make your parents happy, not to find meaning for yourself.

chunks.zh: 探亲就是为了让我维持我与父辈以及父辈与我同年龄段的关系❌探亲就是为了维持父母与他们同辈的关系✅
chunks.en: Visiting relatives is to maintain my relationship with my parents' generation and their peers. ❌ Visiting relatives is to maintain parents' relationship with their peers. ✅

chunks.zh: 不去不就行了，难道父母会把你绑去吗？
chunks.en: Why not just not go? Are your parents going to tie you up and take you?

chunks.zh: 探亲的本质是爷辈渴望团圆的心，与父辈因工作、住址等原因没法久留，而产生的矛盾。
chunks.en: The essence of visiting relatives is the older generation's desire for reunion and the conflict arising from the younger generation's inability to stay long due to work, residence, and other reasons.

chunks.zh: 在更早的时候，父母爷孙都住在一个地方，探亲就变成了除夕守岁、大年初一拜年，大家生活习惯相同又住在一起，自然就也不会出现记不住记不全的情况了。
chunks.en: In earlier times, when parents, grandparents, and grandchildren all lived in one place, visiting relatives became staying up late on New Year's Eve and paying respects on the first day of the Lunar New Year. Since everyone had the same living habits and lived together, there would naturally be no problem of not being able to remember everyone.

chunks.zh: 随着城镇化加快，探亲会更普遍的，随着高铁站飞机场的普及，探亲也慢慢的没那么痛苦了，不过阵痛难免。。。
chunks.en: With the acceleration of urbanization, visiting relatives will become more common. With the popularity of high-speed rail stations and airports, visiting relatives is gradually becoming less painful, but growing pains are inevitable.

chunks.zh: 随着农村因城市的转移支付而逐渐美化，农村也相对宜居了。
chunks.en: As rural areas are gradually beautified due to transfer payments from cities, rural areas are also relatively more livable.

chunks.zh: 但是如果真的住不习惯，其实完全白天在农村，晚上在县城宾馆。
chunks.en: But if you really don't get used to living there, you can spend the day in the countryside and stay in a hotel in the county town at night.

chunks.zh: 这样住的更久一些，意义也更大一些。
chunks.en: Staying longer this way is more meaningful.

chunks.zh: 你父辈能做出“往返 6 小时，吃个饭就走”的行为，说明他本身也不想回，只是迫于舆论压力不得不回，也迫于自己的思乡之情不得不回，在外游子，大年三十最难熬，探亲反倒是“最好的解药”（往返 6 小时换来一年的安心，值了），他带上你只是他想表达自己这一家子很和睦，自己这一家子对爷辈很想念，仅此而已，建议你理解，毕竟往后数，探亲又能有几次呢，你成家了，或许就不用跟着父辈一起出发了。
chunks.en: Your parents' ability to make the behavior of "traveling 6 hours round trip just to eat a meal and leave" shows that they themselves don't really want to go back, but are forced to go back due to public opinion pressure, and also due to their own homesickness. For wanderers away from home, New Year's Eve is the hardest night to endure, and visiting relatives is the "best antidote" (6 hours round trip for a year of peace of mind, it's worth it). They bring you along simply because they want to express that their family is harmonious and that their family misses the older generation very much, nothing more. It is recommended that you understand since how many more times will you have to visit relatives in the future? Once you get married, you may not have to go with your parents anymore.

chunks.zh: 再一个，往返 6 小时，也就是单程 3 小时，大概 300 公里？不算太远吧，大概北京到衡水的距离，我同事河南的，北京出发，高铁回家，单程 6 小时起步。
chunks.en: Another point, a 6-hour round trip means 3 hours each way, which is about 300 kilometers? It's not too far, about the distance from Beijing to Hengshui. My colleague from Henan takes the high-speed rail home from Beijing, which is at least 6 hours each way.

chunks.zh: 不想去就不去呗，有人绑着你，这点小事就来思考人生了，那么闲就去思考思考人为什么要活着？
chunks.en: If you don't want to go, then don't. Is someone tying you up? You're contemplating life over such a small matter. If you're so idle, go consider why people live!

chunks.zh: 这多深奥啊！
chunks.en: That's so profound!

chunks.zh: 等你的父辈有人去世，或者家庭内有重大事项，或者你想借钱的时候，你就知道探亲的意义了，那时候你再感慨没亲戚，就怪不得别人了。
chunks.en: When someone from your parents' generation passes away, or there are major events in the family, or you want to borrow money, you will know the meaning of visiting relatives. If you complain about not having relatives then, you can't blame others.

chunks.zh: 多读书，少上网。
chunks.en: Read more books and spend less time online.

chunks.zh: 看来比较多人的意见是，走亲戚的一大目的是红白事。
chunks.en: It seems that the opinion of many people is that a major purpose of visiting relatives is for weddings and funerals.

chunks.zh: 但是，这不是很荒诞、很荒唐吗？
chunks.en: But isn't that absurd and ridiculous?

chunks.zh: 没有亲戚也能做红白事，区别仅仅在于，如果多亲戚捧场、帮忙，那么，从亲戚们的角度看，这个红白事就评价为办得妥当。
chunks.en: You can still have weddings and funerals without relatives; the only difference is that if many relatives show their support and help out, then from the relatives' point of view, the wedding or funeral will be evaluated as well-managed.

chunks.zh: 逻辑闭环了发现没有，走亲戚，是为了红白事获得亲戚们的高度评价。
chunks.en: Do you see the logical loop? Visiting relatives is to obtain the high praise of relatives for weddings and funerals.

chunks.zh: 那我既然不走亲戚，红白事简单办了，也不需要亲戚的评价啊，这个走亲戚的一大目的真的成立吗？
chunks.en: Since I don't visit relatives, I'll keep weddings and funerals simple, and I don't need the evaluation of relatives, so is this major purpose of visiting relatives really valid?

chunks.zh: ---------------另外说为了度过难关、或者各种方便、门路，说白了就是“人脉”。
chunks.en: ---------------Furthermore, people say it's for getting through difficulties, or various conveniences and connections, in other words, "social network."

chunks.zh: 如果一个人本来就热衷于交际，热衷于经营人脉，那他如果没啥特殊情况也不可能说不想走亲戚啊。
chunks.en: If a person is originally keen on socializing and keen on cultivating a social network, then he would not say that he doesn't want to see relatives unless there is a special situation.

chunks.zh: 一个人不想走亲戚，要么与亲戚有仇怨，要么本来就是不喜欢去经营人脉的，聊得来就一起玩，聊不来也不会为了人脉去阿谀奉承虚与委蛇。
chunks.en: A person who doesn't want to visit relatives either has a feud with relatives, or simply doesn't like to cultivate a social network. If they get along, they'll hang out together; if they don't, they won't flatter and feign compliance for the sake of a social network.

chunks.zh: 因此，说走亲戚很有用的人，与说走亲戚没多大意义的人，根本就是两种人，性格和处事的差异的很大，是底层思维不同，而对“走亲戚”的看法只是表象而已。
chunks.en: Therefore, people who say visiting relatives is very useful and people who say visiting relatives doesn't mean much are fundamentally two different types of people. There are big differences in personality and how they handle things. It's a difference in underlying thinking, and the view of "visiting relatives" is just a superficial one.

chunks.zh: 只谈表象，不谈底层思维，双方自然会有鸡同鸭讲对牛弹琴怎么也讲不通的感觉。
chunks.en: If you only talk about the appearance and don't talk about the underlying thinking, the two sides will naturally have the feeling of talking at cross purposes and not being able to communicate at all, like playing the lute to a cow.

chunks.zh: Op 可能不懂人情世故吧。
chunks.en: The OP probably doesn't understand social interaction.

chunks.zh: 🙃直接过年没回家
chunks.en: 🙃 Directly didn't go home for the New Year

chunks.zh: 当家里面出了大事情的时候，就知道走亲戚的意义了；不好意思大过年的说这个，但的确是这样的。
chunks.en: When something big happens to the family, you'll know the meaning of visiting relatives; sorry to say this during the Chinese New Year, but that's indeed the case.

chunks.zh: 家里有红白事你就知道亲戚意义在哪了。。。
chunks.en: When there are weddings or funerals at home, you'll know where the meaning of relatives lies...

chunks.zh: 特别是白事。。。只有白事里面你才会懂得最深切
chunks.en: Especially funerals... You'll only truly understand it deeply during funerals.

chunks.zh: 还有人说 “领导天天让你加班工作也没这么大意见”，也获得了不少赞。
chunks.en: Someone also said "You don't have as much objection to your boss asking you to work overtime every day," which has also received a lot of likes.

chunks.zh: 奇怪，为什么支持探亲的一方，总是爱提出让人费解的看法。
chunks.en: It's strange, why does the side that supports visiting relatives always like to put forward confusing views?

chunks.zh: 加班没意见？
chunks.en: No objection to overtime?

chunks.zh: 意见不大？
chunks.en: Not much objection?

chunks.zh: 996 不是闹得沸沸扬扬吗，社会级现象，连外国都参与讨论了，现实是反加班闹的动静大，还是反探亲闹的动静大？
chunks.en: Isn't the 996 work schedule causing a lot of noise? It's a societal-level phenomenon that even foreign countries are participating in the discussion. In reality, is the movement against overtime more active, or is the movement against visiting relatives more active?

chunks.zh: 这个非常明显不符合现实，只因为语气很自信，就觉得有道理？
chunks.en: This obviously does not conform to reality. Just because the tone is confident, does that mean it's reasonable?

chunks.zh: 领导天天让你也没这么大意见。
chunks.en: You don't have as much objection to your boss asking you to work every day.

chunks.zh: 配合家人去走半天亲戚比这还委屈？
chunks.en: Is it more of a grievance to spend half a day visiting relatives with your family than that?

chunks.zh: 你有这个想法说明你没有 35
chunks.en: The fact that you have this idea shows that you are not 35

chunks.zh: 我挺理解楼主的
chunks.en: I understand the OP quite well

chunks.zh: @wu67 你是 3 岁的小孩吗？
chunks.en: @wu67 Are you a 3-year-old child?

chunks.zh: 等你有自己的家庭就知道了。
chunks.en: You'll know when you have your own family.

chunks.zh: 你现在啊就是童言无忌。
chunks.en: Right now, you're just speaking without thinking, as children do.

chunks.zh: 如果真的都这样想，太虚无了，活着有啥意义
chunks.en: If everyone really thought like this, it would be too nihilistic. What's the point of living?
